## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description     | Type                                     | Default    |
| --------------- | ----------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `closeOnSelect` | `close-on-select` | Close on select | `boolean`                                | `true`     |
| `open`          | `open`            | Open state      | `boolean`                                | `false`    |
| `placement`     | `placement`       | Placement       | `"bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `'bottom'` |
| `trigger`       | `trigger`         | Trigger         | `"click" \| "hover"`                     | `'click'`  |
